title: Mourning Google
notes: A behind the scenes look at how business wankers are killing Google.

title: Hippy, capitalist, guru, grocer: the forgotten genius who changed British food
notes: Saunders was obsessed with documenting how the new global counterculture was changing the ancient city around him. In 1970, at the age of 32, he self-published his findings in a slim but dense guidebook called Alternative London. The book was testament to Saundersâ€™ belief that information should be made available to all, and that this information should be rigorously tested.

title: Progressively Enhancing a Table with a Web Component
notes: A guide to building a web component to wrap around an existing table to add sort functionality.
